name: Exiles of Kymeria
description:
You have been exiled from the shining city of Kymeria, but you have found a new family amongst other exiles and criminals. However, there is now a Kymerian army heading to your village to wipe you out. You must travel the land to find enough money to hire mercenaries to protect you.

Exiles of Kymeria is a solo or 2-player co-operative hexcrawl fantasy game where you travel a land in order to gather enough treasure in time.
